creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: predominantly blue blouse with multicolored embroidery and shell beadwork; embroidery and beadwork located in lower half of blouse and are arranged in geometric pattern; constructed of two panels; long tasseled fringe decorate sides and center stitch; blue fringe along bottom; neck opening consists of vertical slit; sleeves consist of slits cut at sides
title: Blouse
